name: Metal
passiveSkills: Reduce damage all allies take by 50%
If you are inflicted with passive disabled or perfect disabled when damaged, clear passive and perfect disable from all allies and inflict passive or perfect disable on all enemies for 2 turns
Grant Armor Penetration to each ally for 2 turns every action
Grant 100% Critical Strike Chance for 2 turns to all allies when your HP is below 50%.
